org.cornutum.tcases.util

Class ExecutionNotifier<E extends RuntimeException>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.util.ExecutionContext<E>
      • org.cornutum.tcases.util.ExecutionNotifier<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OpenApiContext, ResolverContext, SystemInputContext

    public abstract class ExecutionNotifier<E extends RuntimeException>
extends ExecutionContext<E>
    An ExecutionContext that uses a Notifier to report execution conditions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      protected ExecutionNotifier(String... startLocation)
      Creates a new ExecutionNotifier instance, starting at the given location.
